content.label: Content
content.type-order-note:
You can use following variables in your email template:

  • CURRENCY_SYMBOL
  • CURRENCY_CODE
  • CURRENCY_NAME
  • CUSTOMER_NAME
  • CUSTOMER_EMAIL
  • CUSTOMER_PHONE
  • CUSTOMER_NOTE
  • CATALOG_ITEM (object *1)
  • ORDER_ID
  • CREATED_AT

*1 CATALOG_ITEM variable is an object in following format:

{
	[fieldName: string]: { 
		key: string,
		name: string,
		value: string,
		default_value: string,
		type: enum,
		is_multilingual: 0 | 1,
		language: null | string
 	}
}

For more information, please consult Blade documentation
